0.1.name: wordpress/pullquote-shortcode
0.1.description:
Pullquote Shortcode register shortcode [pullquote] and adds pullquote button to tinyMCE editor. If you are not using a button you can write shortcode with content like this.

[pullquote]This is my content[/pullquote]

Pullquotes works also in text widgets.
